org.escoladeltreball.ulisesmap.activities

Class BaseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • org.escoladeltreball.ulisesmap.activities.BaseActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoginActivity, MapActivity, MenuActivity, ShowCommentsActivity, ShowPointsActivity, ShowRoutesActivity

    public class BaseActivity
extends Activity
    BaseActivity Handle a option menu used in almost all activities which allow to a user personalize a view of route on the map. Load a user preferences from an android SharedPreferences when an activity is created and store it in Setting class which is used while user stay in this activity and store them back when user start a new one. Also keep a references to a ProgressBar shown while a new activity is loading.
